items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Warcry Gems
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 64% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Supported Skills deal 4% more Damage per Power Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, regardless of whether that skill deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 39% more Area Damage
Supported Skills have 30% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Area Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies, making those hits penetrate enemy cold resistance.
explicitMods: Supported Skills Penetrate 39% Cold Resistance
Supported Skills have 10% chance to inflict Cold Exposure on Hit
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +16 to Intelligence
28% increased Lightning Damage
35% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 80% reduced Spell Damage
20% increased Cast Speed
52% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+46 to maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: and to receive everything in return."

items.name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
8% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
8% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
24% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
22% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.

items.name: Malachai's Loop
explicitMods: 214% increased Energy Shield
+2 to Maximum Power Charges
20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
16% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges
flavourText: It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have -30% to Elemental Resistances
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
+25% to Fire Resistance
+25% to Cold Resistance
Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 30% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff which can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.50 seconds
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

70% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take 835 Damage
Buff grants Immunity to Bleeding

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Deals 308 to 462 Cold Damage
Damage cannot be Reflected
Base radius is 1.2 metres
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 38 to 56 Added Spell Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Deals 659 to 988 Fire Damage
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect

items.name: Ralakesh's Impatience
explicitMods: +17% to Cold Resistance
+15% to Chaos Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed

Count as having maximum number of Endurance Charges
Count as having maximum number of Frenzy Charges

flavourText: The Master of a Million Faces lived by one
simple ethos: why make the effort, when
you can simply mimic what others have?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact, and spreads caustic ground. Enemies standing on the caustic ground take chaos damage over time.

60% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

+0.6 metres to radius

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that aren't triggered.
explicitMods:
Gain 1 Momentum when you Use a Supported Skill
Gain 1 Momentum every 0.51 seconds while Channelling a Supported Skill
Lose all Momentum if you Move
Supported Skills have 20% increased Attack Speed per Momentum

When you reach 5 Momentum, lose all Momentum and gain
Swiftness for 1.5 seconds
Swiftness grants 15% increased Movement Speed per Momentum lost
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Mirage Archer

When you Hit an Enemy with an Arrow from a Supported Skill, Summon a Mirage Archer which uses that Skill
Mirage Archer can use Triggered Attacks as though they were not Triggered
Mirage Archer uses Supported Skill with 60% less Attack Speed
Mirage Archer lasts 4 seconds
Mirage Archer deals 31% less Damage with Supported Skills
